name: I am the Chosen One but my Stats are Awful and I got 10 Days to raise Them
name_original: I am the Chosen One but my Stats are Awful and I got 10 Days to raise Them
description:
So its business as usual. Someone has shown up, told you that you are the chosen one that is going to defeat the Dark One when he appears in 10 days..

The problem? Your stats are terrible. They are all 1's.

Can you raise your stats in this game by doing various activities around the town in an attempt to become powerful enough that the Dark One doesn't defeat you by just sneezing in your direction? Find out in this game.

Features:

-Many various activities to do around town both in the daytime and at night to raise your stats.

-Two ladies to romance. Do you just forget about the Dark One and find love in your last ten days? Its up to you!

-Special Events to find around town. Maybe you can convince someone else to fight for you? Or maybe you can make enough friends that combined you will defeat the Dark One?

Made for the 5th quarterly Driftwood Gaming Jam, Theme of Chosen One.

Download file is a .zip file, hosted on mediafire.

Credits:
